short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension highlights some of the funny words on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You'll be on the edge of your seat with this totally not sketchy new extension! Start at square one and explore new horizons with this fun addon, that points out some of the Tetris community's funny words while you browse the web.
